name: The Rolling Stone (KrystofCL)
description:
The Rolling Stone- A game about destroying peoples lives (thier houses)!

The game is pretty simple, you hit houses for score and try not to lose all your speed.

Bushes slow you down by 2 mph, Trees and Houses by 5 and stone pillars by 15 so try to avoid them.

You can flex with your high scores in the comments on this itch page!
